did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: This collection contains materials relating to the history of the Shell family of Montgomery County, Virginia

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Shell Family Papers must be obtained from the Special Collections, Virginia Tech

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Shell Family Papers, Ms59-001, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Shell Family Papers were donated to the Special Collections in 1959 and 2002.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: The Shell family moved from Pennsylvania to Virginia in the mid-1700s where they joined other early settlers in Montgomery County. While in Virginia, members of this family survived hostile encounters with Native Americans as well as served in the United States military during the Mexican-American war and World War I.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of letters, news clippings, and a historical sketch of the Shell family.

did.unittitle: Historical Sketch of the Shell Family
Correspondence Concerning the Genealogy of the Shell Family
